system.novice: Navigator draws three "Secrets" from the future, they may spend any number of these to increase to gain a +10 bonus per secret on any test they make until the end of the next round. Using more than 1 secret on a test requires the Navigator to roll a d10 per additional secret, on a 7,8,9, or 10 the secret instead gives a -10 to the test. For every use of this power within one hour of the first, the Navigator suffers 1d5 Insanity Points.
system.adept: Additional Secrets only cause a -10 on a d10 roll of a 9 or 10.
system.master: Secrets last and can be spent up to five rounds after the power was used.
